column1: Paragraph 17 of the report dated 08th June 2016 says,
“Following the Presidential election in January 2015, the office of a State
Minister for Child Affairs was created. This decision was reaffirmed after
the parliamentary election in August 2015, as the Ministry of Women and
Child Affairs (MWCA) and the State Ministry of Child Affairs are mandated
to formulate and implement national policies on children…”
